Name: UCSB
Description: A great university located along the California coast!

Name: Los Angeles County Museum of Art
Description: As the Largest Museum in the Western United States. LACMA hold thousands of work that range from Ancient times to contemporary art.  Overall the Museum serves as a mulitcutural center were the public is exposed to so many different culture to increase our understanding of each other.

Name: Chongwenmen, Beijing, China
Description: The city where I grew up, a really beaufitul place with amazing history and tradition. The development is fast with huge change recent years.

Name: The British Museum, London, England
Description: London is one of my favorite cities, a great place to visit, listen to british accent, enjoy the tea and the desert.

Name: Universal Studios Hollywood
Description: A great place to play and have fun. It is fantastic and amazing.

Name: Suzhou, China
Description: This is my hometown, my grandparents live here. A really beautiful place to visit.
